_comment: This is a sample configuration file for vLLM benchmarking. Copy this file and modify it according to your needs.

_notes.env_vars: Environment variables for each test case
_notes.model_params: Model name and VLLM parameters for each test case
_notes.folder_name: Output folder name for each test case
_notes.VLLM_PORT: Port number for VLLM API server
_notes.in_out_lengths: Array of input/output token lengths to test
